attributes.action: Decrease the price of housing in london for the young people.
attributes.additional_details: it affects the children of london right now because when they want to buy a house the prices will be impossible to pay for.
attributes.background: Lower the price of houses in london so the young people can afford housing.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about how much to sell properties for are a matter for individual property owners, not the Government or House of Commons.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
